CustomField.description: Defines the number of Est Vs Actuals records to process synchronously when updating the Project Manager field from Project. Records in excess of this value are processed in a batch. The default is 9000. Consult with Support before changing this setting.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the number of Est Vs Actuals records to process synchronously when updating the Project Manager field from Project. Records in excess of this value are processed in a batch. The default is 9000. Consult with Support before changing this setting.
CustomField.label: Update Project Manager Field Sync Limit
